-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A Generic Base91 Encoder & Decoder
--   
@package base91
@version 2.1.0


-- | A Generic Base91 Encoder &amp; Decoder
module Codec.Binary.Base91

-- | The list of valid characters within a Base91-encoded string.
alphabet :: [Char]

-- | Decodes a <a>Word8</a> output sequence from a <a>Char</a> input
--   sequence in Base91 form; the opposite of <a>encode</a>.
decode :: (Input i Char, Output o Word8) => i -> o

-- | Encodes a <a>Word8</a> input sequence to a <a>Char</a> output sequence
--   in Base91 form; the opposite of <a>decode</a>.
encode :: (Input i Word8, Output o Char) => i -> o

-- | An input sequence <tt>i</tt> containing elements of type <tt>e</tt>.
type Input i e = (MonoFoldable i, Element i ~ e)

-- | An output sequence <tt>o</tt> containing elements of type <tt>e</tt>.
type Output o e = (MonoPointed o, Element o ~ e, Monoid o)
